One of the only reasons why they even released this was for the fans, and i think that we should repay them by supporting them and buying the album on tuesday. RIP Jimmy. A7X for life!!!!

Don't buy the album to support the band. $14.00 of the $15.00 you spend goes to the store and the greedy record company executives. If you want to support the band download their music and then go see a concert or better yet, mail them $15.00.
